new.message:
Look for a folder by entering its name above first.
Not found? Type in the desired name and click on it below to create a new folder.

chooseparent.message: You can also link your new folder to a chosen parent by clicking on any radio button

caption.message: Create new directory in a chosen parent directory from the list below
caption.description: Caption to show on mouse over

anotherparentdir.message: You can now click on any listed sub folder to save a bookmark or choose it as a parent again
